scenario: In 2025, Alice has wages of $86,897.49. Alice also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $39,074.82 for the year. Alice has passive income from another source of $28,171.04.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2025 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. With $28,171.04 in passive income, only $28,171.04 of the $39,074.82 loss is deductible.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
